positive.review: Ease of use is great hence: you focus on the fun --  killing   cool game and even for free its equal footing for all players easy to level up as well.
It's a great game to play. The other players are very cooperative and play as a team.
This game is addicting just like delta force and COD!
Best 3rd person shooter I've played in a long time, especially with PVPVE modes!
Not horrible shooter. I like how short the matches are.
a fun game to play would recommend to friends
I'm really bad at the PVP in this game, but it doesn't matter since I'm always paired with Russian Hackers with Aimbot who carry and win the game for me.
cool game, but sadly dying, and the only people that play this game are Russian-speaking, which doesn't impact me personally that much as i can speak Russian, but others might struggle.

I mostly play the pve, the game is fun, but very grind heavy for new characters. you will get some characters for free at the start so don't jump to buy one right away. I am 73 hours in, mostly play sniper class now, one-shot kills are great. having to level up other characters to unlock additional bonuses is a great idea and adds a little diversity to the game. the multiplayer connectivity could be better, most games are usually 2-3 players out of the 4 which makes the missions harder. I played a little of the pvp, if you like to be challenged, you'll like it. 
 my only real negative is that getting new weapons is impossible except from random weapon crates that take the same credits that you need for new characters.
 also in the games store page, once a week 3 random characters will go on sale (about 50k credits off) so keep an eye on that.

The game is, okay I guess.
Could be better. Especially some skins do not fit the game.
Had fun playing it, but I do not see any reason to do that anymore.

-F2p friendly
-full controller support 
-smooth precise gameplay (even on a potato)
-pve co op missions 
-tons of different characters 
-rpg level up system 
-stable servers 
-short queue time
Ease of use is great hence: you focus on the fun --  killing   cool game and even for free its equal footing for all players easy to level up as well.
yeah i like the devision style game for the other game this the most accurate one i like this game the scene and the mission
It's a great game to play. The other players are very cooperative and play as a team.
Nice and intersting shooter with fast and dynamic pvp matches
Great game, but needs servers in the US and y'all need to market this game!
installed, i launch, authentication problems, change dns, change ip nothin. love this game!
Feels like a mix between call of duty and rainbow six siege but is decent
you get 1 mil credits for doing 20 matches of either pvp pve or pvpve

A fun game as you can see i have played it for 30 hours . i will continue to play it daily .
i would recommend this game .
This game is addicting just like delta force and COD!

games very good but the shop is a complete scam. can still play as the locked characters without paying in the 1v1 mode with your friends though and most characters can be unlocked through just playing the game normally. no reason not to try it
Best 3rd person shooter I've played in a long time, especially with PVPVE modes!
Not horrible shooter. I like how short the matches are.
VERY INTENSE, FAST PACED. NO TIME TO SLACK
a fun game to play would recommend to friends
I'm really bad at the PVP in this game, but it doesn't matter since I'm always paired with Russian Hackers with Aimbot who carry and win the game for me.

I played a little of the pvp, if you like to be challenged, you'll like it. 
 my only real negative is that getting new weapons is impossible except from random weapon crates that take the same credits that you need for new characters.
 also in the games store page, once a week 3 random characters will go on sale (about 50k credits off) so keep an eye on that.

The game is, okay I guess.
Could be better. Especially some skins do not fit the game.
Had fun playing it, but I do not see any reason to do that anymore.

negative.review:
This game is hard to review, because what i did play, i enjoyed, i had fun, the shooting was decent, the operators were interesting. 
the maps were cool.
But what this is getting a thumbs down. 
progression is SLOW. and I mean it puts rainbow six siege slow to shame. you will grind for wekks maybe months for a single character

second are the weapons, for a game with so many dang operators, the amount of weapons choices are Seriously lacking.  I know they wanted to limit them by country, but no, that excuse doesn't work either cause premium guns can be used on any operator so no don't say that

how to fix it? easy up on the slow progression, second. unlock the gun restrictions, its the operators SKILLS that make them unique not their weapons. the Medic was so effing usless in combat and their energy recovered so dang slowly that they might as well not exist. 
on top of that, you take the same currency to unlock characters to unlock skills. 
why not just have all operators unlocked and then have us use that money to make the ones we want better. 

there are so many ways you could go with this that are better than what you have now. instead you get a thumbs down.

So... ping/latency in my region has killed me more than other players so far, I also don't think weapons and attachments should be locked behind loot boxes and the amount of operators and variations is good but is also overwhelming and given the small player base is difficult to get useful tutorials, the game offers a way to try these operators with a training mode which is good if you have the time to do that, I don't because there's too many.

The game is free so try it if you want, maybe you'll get lucky and your ping won't suck.

GAME HAS PROMISE BUT it honestly a joke so unrealistic pay to win bullshit o,p operators crap game design you mite break your p.c with fustration from the feeling of bein cheated every round and watch 2 clips bounce of your target then get 1 shoted when they blink at you sorry but dnt recomend and not enough pvp game modes

i only played one game cant play again the game crashes every time i cant even open a loot box with out this game crashing it broken as hell and looks like it was made by a 5 year old 2/10 really bad game
Tactical shooter with a slower pace ‚Äî feels great when played as a team. Underrated and very satisfying once you get into it.
Absolutely no control over the match making in skill level and the amount of cheaters...
35 usd for a op is a  bit excessive
Devs are greedy, gone crazy :) So they can f themselves.
error 1053
no

This game used to be great, because everyone can play it. When I mean everyone, even linux users. Now that SARD is in place. No proton hotfix can kan resolve it from launching on linx (I'm in Fedora 43). If you plan to play on that  giant spyware (Windows 11), go ahead and play this. Too bad for us linux users.

I bought Caliber+ 
a one time purchase of a DLC for around $40 that gave "permanent" VIP access.
It has been removed from the store, and from the game.

Absolute Trash-Tier move by the RUSSIAN devs and they no longer deserve my patronage.

At first it was pretty fun but then as I got deeper into it I saw it's issues. first off all these people are playing but they're not actually there they're just Bots standing there hoping you do the work to win the battle and I get sick of that and if I leave the battle I get penalized and can't play for like 5 minutes. so that's going to murder this game. the gameplay is epic fun though and I do enjoy the PVE part of it!
Game is ok not total complete ass but somewhat ass because it gets repetitive and boring real quick. A lot Russians so it feels like you are playing a Russian war simulator.

This game is hard to review, because what i did play, i enjoyed, i had fun, the shooting was decent, the operators were interesting. 
the maps were cool.
But what this is getting a thumbs down. 
progression is SLOW. and I mean it puts rainbow six siege slow to shame. you will grind for wekks maybe months for a single character

second are the weapons, for a game with so many dang operators, the amount of weapons choices are Seriously lacking.  I know they wanted to limit them by country, but no, that excuse doesn't work either cause premium guns can be used on any operator so no don't say that

how to fix it? easy up on the slow progression, second. unlock the gun restrictions, its the operators SKILLS that make them unique not their weapons. the Medic was so effing usless in combat and their energy recovered so dang slowly that they might as well not exist. 
on top of that, you take the same currency to unlock characters to unlock skills. 
why not just have all operators unlocked and then have us use that money to make the ones we want better. 

there are so many ways you could go with this that are better than what you have now. instead you get a thumbs down.

So... ping/latency in my region has killed me more than other players so far, I also don't think weapons and attachments should be locked behind loot boxes and the amount of operators and variations is good but is also overwhelming and given the small player base is difficult to get useful tutorials, the game offers a way to try these operators with a training mode which is good if you have the time to do that, I don't because there's too many.

The game is free so try it if you want, maybe you'll get lucky and your ping won't suck.

it requires +20 mb bandwith, maybe more, wtf???!! 
also game lags at PVE mods, enemies fly after you kill them.

Poor implementation of the game, constant problems, crashes, crashes, the developers are aware of the problem, do nothing, new cosmetic there are no new gameplay solutions, there are no new maps, they added 9 players for a 4-player map and called it a new mode. In general, the game is not worth attention

GAME HAS PROMISE BUT it honestly a joke so unrealistic pay to win bullshit o,p operators crap game design you mite break your p.c with fustration from the feeling of bein cheated every round and watch 2 clips bounce of your target then get 1 shoted when they blink at you sorry but dnt recomend and not enough pvp game modes

Game is literally unplayable. The game has so much lag that I can't even leave the starting area of any match- and if I get a few seconds of playtime, it teleports me back to the starting area of the map and has me teleporting all over that little area. Every match I've tried to play is so bad that it may as well have hacked my computer and stolen any attempt at control from me. Can't move, can't look around, can't ads, can't switch weapons, can't activate abilities- and I've tried to play. I really have. The worst part is that I can't even give contructive feedback because the game doesn't give enough information for me to figure out wtf is actually the problem. Best I can tell is that the servers are either extremely low quality and/or somewhere in the middle of bumf*ck nowhere China. That would be the only thing I can think of that would cause the lag issues since bad optimization wouldn't cause rubber-banding, lag teleporting, and the other issues I have.

I know the issue isn't my machine or internet because I can play COD or Space Marine 2, or Helldivers 2, or any number of other games with no issues aside from their game servers- COD being the worst about it. I can even play Skyrim modpacks like Lorerim, Wuunduniik, and Nolvus with smooth performance.

i only played one game cant play again the game crashes every time i cant even open a loot box with out this game crashing it broken as hell and looks like it was made by a 5 year old 2/10 really bad game
Tactical shooter with a slower pace ‚Äî feels great when played as a team. Underrated and very satisfying once you get into it.
Absolutely no control over the match making in skill level and the amount of cheaters...
DO NOT PLAY IT! It is not worth your time. they care more about looks rather than the functionality of the game. Trash.

I do not recommend this game, it is dead and it is also full of chetos, if you want to report them you waste your time since the anti-cheat system is not going to do anything. Even though this is free, it is better to try another game and where the anti-cheat system works if you manage to get one like that.

this game is not worth playing, everything in the menu is too comolicated, barley anyone laying the game and even if you get any players in pve or pvp, they are always being idiots where they do nothing or act like bots

i was a poor little kid when i played this and didnt have the balls to ask my dad to pay for rainbow six siege
then i bought rainbow
and saw what a bad knock off i was playing
A very strange shooter, after warface, cs2, cod. Strange balance, strange graphics and in general everything in this game is strange
Dogshit rip off of socom, lazy p2w filled with russian cheaters and no oce support or servers. DONT WASTE YOUR TIME
New anticheat bans Linux so I can't play on my deck anymore. Thanks devs!

!!!!! WARNING !!!!!
!!!!! IGNORE THIS PRODUCT OF GAME DEVELOPMENT AT ALL COST !!!!!
Pay-to-win Russian trash. 
Devs care ONLY about money. 
New operators and new weapons are ONLY bought for real money and are OP. Devs nerf them one year later when it becomes available to purchase for in-game currency.
Matchmaking is broken. Your team is full of solo players VS 4 tryhards is a common thing.
8 VS 8 (where you have 3 players and 5 bots VS 6 players with 2 bots)
Power creep only for money. 
W/O real money progress is very slow. 
Better buy Nicki Minaj in COD than sponsor this product.
